MACH
   
The Elmeco MACH, patented in 1983, provides cold drinks as well as granita drinks. Ideal for iced coffee, iced cappuccino and iced tea.
 
Specifications
  • every tank functions independantly
  • absolute hygiene is guaranteed by the original distribution system
  • the product is constantly homogeneous
  • the horizontal mixer guarantees continuous service
  • all parts in contact with the product can be easily cleaned
  • light by halogen lamps to enhance appearance of product
  • available in 2 and 3 group versions
   
TECHNICAL DATA
  MACH2 MACH3
Tank capacity (liters) 2x8 lt 3x8 lt
Voltage 110V, 60 Hz
Absorption 820W 910W
Dimensions (mm) WxDxH
410x500x650		 WxDxH
590x500x650
Weight (kg) 53 63
The manufacturer reserves the right to modify the appliances without further notice.
